definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: However, in Sichuan Changhong's color TV sets and mobile phones will have better performance.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在四川长虹的彩电和手机将有更好的表现。

sentences.english: He was cracking on about having colour TV.
sentences.chinese: 他在继续不停地谈论着有关买彩电的话题。

sentences.english: Is this the shop in which you bought the color -Tv?
sentences.chinese: 这就是你买彩电的那家商店吗？

sentences.english: The safety and reliability of color tv set depend on flyback transformer to a great extent.
sentences.chinese: 彩电的安全性与可靠性很大程度上决定于回扫变压器。

sentences.english: It is an amazing film which brings dinosaur alive on screen.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部将活生生的恐龙搬上银幕的精彩电影。

sentences.english: To his surprise, a giant console color TV was delivered to his home.
sentences.chinese: 令他惊讶的是，一台巨大的落地式彩电就在面前。

sentences.english: Movie theaters show good films from the West.
sentences.chinese: 电影院里放映的都是西方的精彩电影。

sentences.english: Aunt Wang is planning to buy a colour TV set next month.
sentences.chinese: 王大妈算计着下月买一台彩电。

sentences.english: Rear projection TV receives satellite TV program, High-quality VOD (video on demand).
sentences.chinese: 背投彩电接收卫星电视节目，优质VOD视频点播。

sentences.english: Watching a good movie cuddied up on a couch with someone you love.
sentences.chinese: 与喜欢的人相拥在沙发上看一部精彩电影。

sentences.english: Dual thermistors total solution to degaussing for pure flat color TV of large size screen.
sentences.chinese: 大屏幕纯平彩电的双消磁解决方案。

sentences.english: The colour TV sets were made in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 这台彩电是一九九一年制造的。

sentences.english: He took away our big color television on a flatbed tricycle.
sentences.chinese: 他用平板车拉走了我家的大彩电。

sentences.english: They spent 4450 yuan buying the big colour TV set.
sentences.chinese: 他们买那台大彩电花了4450元。

definition: household electric appliance/abbr. for 家用電器|家用电器
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
